description: Try our easy to follow Watermelon & Kiwi Iceblocks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ice blocks,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Low kilojoule,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Watermelon,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Watermelon & Kiwi Iceblocks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Process watermelon in a food processor until smooth. Pour evenly into 10 x 1/3-cup iceblock moulds. Insert sticks and freeze for about 30 minutes or until firm.
Process kiwifruit in a food processor until smooth. Pour kiwi pur√©e over firm watermelon layer. Freeze overnight or until firm.
To serve, dip moulds in hot water to loosen and carefully remove iceblocks.
